content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Mário Soares

|term_end =
|predecessor = Ramalho Eanes
|successor = Jorge Sampaio
|website =
}}
Below is a list of international presidential trips made by Mário Soares as President of the Portuguese Republic.
First term (1986-1991)
1986
{| class="wikitable"
!Country
!Locations
!Date
!Details
|-
|
|São Tomé, Príncipe
|5-8 December
|
|-

|Praia, Tarrafal
|8-11 December
|
|}
1987
{| class="wikitable"
!Country
!Locations
!Date
!Details
|-
|
|São Paulo
|28 March-April 5
|Received a honoris causa by the São Paulo State University (UNESP).
|-
|
|Moscow, Yerevan, Baku
|22-29 November
|Meeting with the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, Mikhail Gorbachev and with activist Andrei Sakharov.
|-
|
|Madrid, Salamanca, Barcelona, Seville
|14-19 December
|
|}
